50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: Umar said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah [SAW] say: 'Allahumma, inni a'udhu bi-'azamatika an ughtala min tahti (O Allah, I seek refuge in Your greatness from being swallowed up from beneath me)

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from Being Swallowed up by the Earth
